comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: This appears to be a drawing for her. Her keel was laid down on 25 October 1916 by the Mare Island Naval Shipyard at Vallejo, California. She was launched 20 November 1919 sponsored by Mrs. R.T. (Barbara Stephens) Zane, daughter of California governor William D. Stephens en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_California_(BB-44)
